title: Whole PC freezing when entering game
body: I need some help; for about a month now I haven't been able to play at all because once I get into game my whole entire PC freezes. I've tried upgrading my drivers, downgrading them, and even resetting my pc. Nothing has worked for me yet. Could I get any help?

replies.body:
If you're on Windows 10, this is likely caused by the *Game DVR* feature inside the Windows Game Bar. I strongly recommend disabling this feature with [this guide](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to check if this was the cause.

Let me know if this caused any change.
This seems to of fixed the problem. Thank you very much!
